definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: GE said the charges are inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气说，这些指控是错误的。

sentences.english: Revenues last year were just $5.3 billion.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气去年的在华收入仅53亿美元。

sentences.english: The stock fell for the week.
sentences.chinese: 但通用电气的股价在那一周还是下跌。

sentences.english: GE is the biggest brand-name supplier in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气是美国最大的品牌供应商。

sentences.english: GE painted itself green with its "ecomagination" crusade.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气通过“绿色创想”计划为其打上绿色标签。

sentences.english: Mubadala is expected to become one of GE’s ten largest shareholders.
sentences.chinese: Mubadala有望成为通用电气的十大股东之一。

sentences.english: Thomas Edison and Charles Coffin, of GE.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气的托马斯爱迪生和查尔斯科芬。

sentences.english: G. E. will unveil a specialized home version of the charger later this year.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气将于今年公布这一充电站的特别家庭版。

sentences.english: G. E. is the nation's largest corporation.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气是美国最大的公司。

sentences.english: " appear to be unbeatable, " said Hou Zhendong, an HR manager at General Electric.
sentences.chinese: 主角似乎是无敌超人，通用电气的人事经理侯振东说。

sentences.english: In the days after the accident, GE said none of its equipment was in place at the accident scene.
sentences.chinese: 事故过后几天，通用电气说事故现场没有它的设备。

sentences.english: Does it look like I have a G.E. logo printed on my forehead?
sentences.chinese: 难道我看起来脑门上是印着通用电气的商标吗？

sentences.english: A good example is GE's development of LCD terminals for cockpits .
sentences.chinese: 通用电气开发驾驶舱用液晶显示器就是一例。

sentences.english: Start talking about GM, and the superlatives soon run out.
sentences.chinese: 在开始讨论通用电气以及即将到来的破产之时。

pinyin: Lian2 he2 Ji4 shu4 Gong1 si1
Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1
Mei3 guo2 Dian4 hua4 Dian4 bao4 Gong1 si1

definition: Rolls-Royce (UK company)/also written 勞斯萊斯|劳斯莱斯[Lao2 si1 Lai2 si1]
pinyin: Luo2 er3 si1 · Luo2 yi1 si1
Ka3 te4 bi3 le4 gong1 si1
Ying1 guo2 shi2 you2 gong1 si1
